features: Regular articulated fit is just right: Not too tight or too baggy, with shaping at the elbows and shoulders for easy movement

Gore-Tex three-layer fabric is every bit as weatherproof, breathable, and durable as two-layer fabric but features a Gore-Tex membrane laminated between the outer shell and a tricot knit scrim that eliminates the need for the separate lining found in two-layer fabric; Gore-Tex fabric is Guaranteed to keep you dry™
Brushed shell backer provides lightweight warmth; Pit Zip vents
StormForm attached hood with drop construction and Cohaesive embedded cinch and hood length adjustment; Fully-taped seams create the ultimate seal against foul weather
Ergonomic water-repellent zip-out stretch waist gaiter with jacket-to-pant interface; Two-way center front zipper
Power mesh wrist gaiters; Shaped cuffs; Recco® reflector; Ykk® water-resistant zippers
Interior power mesh dump pockets, zippered chest pocket, zippered hand-warmer pockets, zippered internal chest pocket, and zippered sleeve pass pocket
Bluesign® approved materials use only safe chemicals and reduce impact on both humans and the planet during manufacturing
Gore-Tex Brushed Warm Backer Stretch 3-Layer Nylon 30D Plain Weave Fabric
